鎧鮫: (ヨロイザメ) - kitefin shark (Dalatias licha); seal shark
鎧鼬魚: (ヨロイイタチウオ) - snubnose brotula; armoured cusk (Hoplobrotula armata)
鎬: (こう) - Sword-blade Ridges , ridges on a blade (espada, faca, etc.); ridged pattern in building
鎬を削る: (しのぎをけずる) - to compete ruthlessly; to sharpen swords
鎬鑿: (しのぎのみ) - chisel for making dovetail joints
鎮まる: (しずまる) - to quieten down; to calm down; to subside; to die down; to abate; to be suppressed
鎮める: (しずめる) - to appease; to suppress; to calm
鎮め物: (しずめもの) - {sumo} sacred items buried in the ring during its ritual purification
鎮子: (ちんじ) - ornamental weights used to keep curtains and the like from blowing around in the wind
鎮守: (ちんじゅ) - local Shinto deity; tutelary god
鎮守の杜: (ちんじゅのもり) - grove of the village shrine
鎮守の森: (ちんじゅのもり) - grove of the village shrine
鎮守の神: (ちんじゅのかみ) - local deity; guardian god
鎮守府: (ちんじゅふ) - (historical) army base; navy base
鎮守社: (ちんじゅしゃ) - Shinto shrine on Buddhist temple grounds dedicated to the tutelary deity of the area
鎮木: (ちぎ) - ornamental crossed rafter ends on shrine gables
鎮火: (ちんか) - extinguishing; dying out (of a fire); putting out
鎮痙剤: (ちんけいざい) - antispasmodic drug; spasmolytic drug; anticonvulsant drug
鎮痙薬: (ちんけいやく) - antispasmodic drug; spasmolytic drug; anticonvulsant drug
鎮痛: (chintsuu) - alívio da dor, matar a dor
鎮痛剤: (ちんつうざい) - analgesic; painkiller; sedative; tranquilizer; tranquiliser
鎮祭: (ちんさい) - religious ceremony (to appease the gods)
鎮西派: (ちんぜいは) - Chinzei sect (of Pure Land Buddhism)
鎮護国家: (ちんごこっか) - spiritual protection of the state
鎮静: (ちんせい) - (esp. human-induced)  calm; quiet; tranquility; tranquillity; appeasement; pacification
鎮静剤: (ちんせいざい) - painkiller; sedative; tranquilizer; tranquiliser
鎮静化: (ちんせいか) - calming down; quieting down
鎮魂ミサ曲: (ちんこんミサきょく) - Requiem Mass
鎮魂帰神: (ちんこんきしん) - return to the divine through spiritual quietude
鎮魂祭: (ちんこんさい) - mass or ceremony for the repose of a soul
鎺: (はばき) - metal collar mounted between a sword blade and the hand guard
鏑矢: (かぶらや) - arrow to which is attached a turnip-shaped whistle made of hollowed-out wood or deer horn; whistling arrow used to signal the start of battle
鏗々: (こうこう) - the ringing out of bells or chimes
鏗然: (こうぜん) - emitting a shrill sound (musical instrument, metal, stone)
鏗鏗: (こうこう) - the ringing out of bells or chimes
鏗鏘: (こうそう) - the resoudning sound of bells, musical instruments, stones being struck, etc.
鏝: (まん) - Ferro de solda, chapinha; ferro de solda; alicate de crimpagem, modelador de cachos; colher de pedreiro
鏡: (hoje/espelho) - mirror , mirror, looking-glass; barrel head; page added at the beginning of a document mentioning its purpose, date, author, etc.
鏡に映る: (かがみにうつる) - to be reflected in a mirror
鏡の間: (かがみのま) - room behind the curtain of a noh stage, where the actors prepare/greenroom (noh)/mirror room; hall of mirrors (at Versailles)
鏡を抜く: (かがみをぬく) - to uncask; to open a barrel
鏡ノ間: (かがみのま) - room behind the curtain of a noh stage, where the actors prepare/greenroom (noh)/mirror room; hall of mirrors (at Versailles)
鏡像: (きょうぞう) - reflected image/mirror image; math image by inversion
鏡割: (かがみわり) - breaking open a ceremonial sake barrel
鏡割り: (かがみわり) - breaking open a ceremonial sake barrel
鏡映文字: (きょうえいもじ) - mirror writing; mirrored script
鏡板: (かがみいた) - panel/scene-panel; (symbolically a reflection of tree at the front of the stage) painted backdrop (panel at the back of a noh stage), on which a pine tree is painted
鏡磨ぎ: (かがみとぎ) - polishing a metallic mirror
鏡筒: (きょうとう) - lens-barrel; lens tube (e.g. of a telescope)
鏡花水月: (きょうかすいげつ) - (yoji) flowers reflected on a mirror and the moon reflected on the water's surface; something that is visible but having no substance; the subtle and profound beauty of poems that cannot be described in words
鏡貝: (カガミガイ) - Dosinia japonica (species of Venus clam)
鏡開き: (かがみびらき) - cutting the New Year's rice cake (January 11th); traditional breaking of a sake cask at weddings, receptions, etc.
鏡面仕上げ: (きょうめんしあげ) - mirror finish
鏡面反射: (きょうめんはんしゃ) - specular reflection
鏡面反射係数: (きょうめんはんしゃけいすう) - specular reflection coefficient
鏡面反射指数: (きょうめんはんしゃしすう) - specular exponent
鏡面反射色: (きょうめんはんしゃしょく) - specular colour
鏡餠: (かがみもち) - mirror-shaped mochi, usu. a pair stacked in order of size with a daidai on top, used as a New Year offering, then cut and eaten on January 11.
鏡高: (きょうこう) - height of a mirror stand
鏤める: (ちりばめる) - to inlay; to set; to stud (e.g. star-studded sky); to enchase (a thing) with; to mount (gem)
鐘: (shou/kane) - bell , bell (often a large hanging bell), chime
鐘の音: (かねのね) - chimes; toll of a bell
鐘を突く: (かねをつく) - to strike a bell
鐘乳洞: (しょうにゅうどう) - limestone cave; limestone cavern; limestone grotto
